text: Ariana Grande was forced to pull out of her performance at the 2018 Brit Awards in London on Wednesday, February 21, due to an illness. “ Ariana fell ill and was going to come in spite of that, but was ordered by her doctor to not fly, ” a source tells Us Weekly.
